text:
@ProjectLincoln @gtconway3d @realDonaldTrump The media needs to stop pretending like he didn't do a bunch of overtly negative things to slow COVID-19 Testing.
-Declined kits from WHO
-Phony Kushner made kits for $$$
-Passed the buck to states, then disrupted the supply chain by stealing kit components.
